dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent failed to identify the root cause related to CM and frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent did not capture the causal chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified most metrics but missed some specific percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was not fully logical as it abstained from making a grounded diagnosis.
missing_elements: logical flow from CM to VCORE

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested actions were basic and lacked specific historical fixes.
